issue.title: [R] Allow all cast options to be specified
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17605](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17605). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the make_cast_options function in r/src only handles three of the cast options; all others are silently ignored.
